topic.title: HPE OneView/Synergy Servers
topic.shortdesc: This page allows you to view and provision HPE Synergy and other HPE server hardware that is managed in HPE OneView into activated ESXi compute clusters.

ul.li: The search bar allows you to filter the servers you want to view. State and Hypervisor are examples of server criteria that can be specified. Additionally, you can filter by typing in text similar to searching by keywords.
You can sort using the column headers in the table.
View and provision HPE Synergy and other HPE server hardware that is managed in HPE OneView into activated ESXi compute clusters.
Add (or import) provisioned RHEL KVM and Hyper-V servers that are managed in HPE OneView. You can then activate the servers as compute hosts.

p.note: Check the Support Matrix for required versions of HPE OneView to enable these features.
